input.sentences: a speech was given during the celebration .
the children were happy to celebrate .
output.sentences: The celebration was a special one and required a speech.
Because it was a festive evening everyone dressed up to honor our daughter and there was a special cake with candles.
All the candles on display shone brightly and seemed to wish our little girl every happiness.
Susannah enjoyed her special day and was happy to celebrate with the other children.
After the speeches and the service and celebration there was plenty of food for everyone to enjoy.
